Description: On I-495 at mile marker 52.7 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 292.7 in the City of Chesapeake, near 464 Interchange, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On VA-100 in the County of Carroll, in the vicinity of Amelia Ln; Rt. 1104E/W (Carroll County), motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
